frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-block-caribou
frozen.shortDescription: Blocks caribou (the on screen keyboard) from popping up when you use a touchscreen. Even if it's disabled in the accessibility services menu. Continuation of keringar's work. Note, only tested on gnome shell version 4.40 on Fedora 34 with Xorg
frozen.longDescription: Blocks caribou (the on screen keyboard) from popping up when you use a touchscreen. Even if it's disabled in the accessibility services menu. Continuation of keringar's work. Note, only tested on gnome shell version 4.40 on Fedora 34 with Xorg
